document.full_text: authorities in germany are searching for a place for 91-year-old convicted nazi death camp guard john demjanjuk to live while he is free on appeal, one of his lawyers said friday.
document.title: convicted nazi guard demjanjuk needs a home: lawyer
lines_and_colors: authorities in germany are searching for a place for 91-year-old convicted nazi death camp guard john demjanjuk to live while he is free on appeal, one of his lawyers said friday.
